lead_paragraph: A blanket ban on Russia at the Rio de Janeiro Games would have had devastating consequences, International Olympic Committee President Thomas Bach said on Tuesday, defending his organisation's decision to allow some Russians to compete.

headline.print_headline: Doping-Blanket Russia Ban Would Have Been 'Nuclear Option:' IOC's Bach
headline.main: Doping-Blanket Russia Ban Would Have Been 'Nuclear Option:' IOC's Bach

snippet: A blanket ban on Russia at the Rio de Janeiro Games would have had devastating consequences, International Olympic Committee President Thomas Bach said on Tuesday, defending his organisation's decision to allow some Russians to compete....
